Category.name: pricingengines
Category.description: functions to construct and use PricingEngine objects.
Category.copyright: Copyright (C) 2006, 2007, 2008, 2012 Ferdinando Ametrano Copyright (C) 2007 Eric Ehlers Copyright (C) 2016 Stefano Fondi

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormula
Procedure.description: Black 1976 formula for option pricing, using displacement.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaCashItmProbability
Procedure.description: Black 1976 probability of being in the money (in the bond martingale measure), i.e. N(d2). It is a risk-neutral probability, not the real world one.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaImpliedStdDevApproximation
Procedure.description: Approximation for the standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry) implied by the Black 1976 formula.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaImpliedStdDev
Procedure.description: Standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry) implied by the Black 1976 formula with displacement.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaStdDevDerivative
Procedure.description: Black 1976 formula for the derivative with respect to the standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry), with displacement.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBachelierBlackFormula
Procedure.description: Black style formula when forward is normal rather than log-normal, i.e. essentially the model of Bachelier.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized ABSOLUTE volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: TimeToExpiry
Parameter.description: time to expiry as year fraction.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormula2
Procedure.description: Black 1976 formula for option pricing with displacement. It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaCashItmProbability2
Procedure.description: Black 1976 probability of being in the money (in the bond martingale measure), i.e. N(d2). It is a risk-neutral probability, not the real world one. It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaImpliedStdDevApproximation2
Procedure.description: Approximation for the standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry) implied by the Black 1976 formula. It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaImpliedStdDev2
Procedure.description: Standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry) implied by the Black 1976 formula. It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBlackFormulaStdDevDerivative2
Procedure.description: Black 1976 formula for the derivative with respect to the standard deviation (annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry). It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Procedure.name: qlBachelierBlackFormula2
Procedure.description: Black style formula when forward is normal rather than log-normal, i.e. essentially the model of Bachelier. It uses a PlainVanillaPayoff object as input.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized ABSOLUTE volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorValue
Member.description: returns the option value for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorDeltaForward
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to change in the underlying forward price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorDelta
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorElasticityForward
Member.description: returns the sensitivity in percent to a percent change in the underlying forward price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorElasticity
Member.description: returns the sensitivity in percent to a percent change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorGammaForward
Member.description: returns the second order derivative with respect to change in the underlying forward price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorGamma
Member.description: returns the second order derivative with respect to change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorTheta
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to time to maturity for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorThetaPerDay
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to time to maturity per day, assuming 365 days per year, for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorVega
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to volatility for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorRho
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to discounting rate for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorDividendRho
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to dividend/growth rate for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorItmCashProbability
Member.description: returns the probability of being in the money in the bond martingale measure for the given BlackCalculator object. It is a risk-neutral probability, not the real world probability.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorItmAssetProbability
Member.description: returns the probability of being in the money in the asset martingale measure for the given BlackCalculator object. It is a risk-neutral probability, not the real world probability.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorStrikeSensitivity
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to strike for the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorAlpha
Member.description: returns the alpha of the internal formulation of the given BlackCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackCalculatorBeta
Member.description: returns the beta of the internal formulation of the given BlackCalculator object.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Member.name: qlBlackScholesCalculatorDelta
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackScholesCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackScholesCalculatorElasticity
Member.description: returns the sensitivity in percent to a percent change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackScholesCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackScholesCalculatorGamma
Member.description: returns the second order derivative with respect to change in the underlying spot price for the given BlackScholesCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackScholesCalculatorTheta
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to time to maturity for the given BlackScholesCalculator object.

Member.name: qlBlackScholesCalculatorThetaPerDay
Member.description: returns the sensitivity to time to maturity per day, assuming 365 days per year, for the given BlackScholesCalculator object.

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: StdDev
Parameter.description: standard deviation, i.e. annualized percentage volatility times the square root of time to option expiry.

Parameter.name: Deflator
Parameter.description: Deflator (usually the discount factor, or the annuity, etc.).

Parameter.name: YieldCurve
Parameter.description: discounting yield term structure object ID.

Parameter.name: IncludeSettlDate
Parameter.description: TRUE if cashflows paid at the settlement date must be taken into account.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: cashflows before this date are not taken into account. If missing it is assumed equal to the discounting yield term structure's reference date.

Parameter.name: NpvDate
Parameter.description: all cashflows are discounted to this date. If missing it is assumed equal to the discounting yield term structure's reference date.

Parameter.name: YieldCurve
Parameter.description: discounting yield term structure object ID.

Parameter.name: YieldCurve
Parameter.description: discounting yield term structure object ID.

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Parameter.name: Displacement
Parameter.description: displacement in a displaced diffusion model.

Parameter.name: HandleModel
Parameter.description: affine model (providing a discount bond option pricing formula) object ID.

Parameter.name: YieldCurve
Parameter.description: discounting yield term structure object ID.
